radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echogenicity with a 1.8 x 1.9 x 1.9 cm right lobe hemangioma. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. The gallbladder has cholelithiasis without evidence of cholecystitis. The common bile duct measures 6 mm and is normal. Partially imaged pancreas is unremarkable.
